person.note: Li(2) Gang [8078] His ancestors were Longxi jun Li(2), members of the Tang imperial family, who lived in Jiangnan. A member of this lineage was prefect of Jianzhou where he died in office and his family stayed there. In 908, this part of Jianzhou was made into Shaowu jun (p.1). Wanli Changzhou FZ, 11B.11a lists him as a Wuxi county jinshi, a source which also records his father, Kui [3510], as a Wuxi county resident. Kui must have moved to Wuxi and Gang's descendants must have moved back to Shaowu. Gang's grandmother was Huang(2) Lu's [8066] younger sister. Gang was Kui's [3510] son, Wei(1)'s [1107] elder brother (p. 3). Zhang(1) Gen's [255] son-in-law (she died in 1152 [xingzhuang] (p.12), father of the betrothed of Zhou(1) Chi's [476] granddaughter, Li(2) K [4159], brother of the wife of Zhou(1) Chi's [476] grandson-in-law, Zhang(1) Jin [3128], and affinal relation of Liu(2) Yi [1201]. His mother, Wu(3) Shi, was from an aristocratic lineage (wangzu) originally from Shaoxing, Shanyin xian which subsequently moved to Chuzhou, Longquan xian to avoid a late Tang local rebellion. Her aunt (her grandfather's daughter) was Lu(5) Bi's [7051] wife. This Lu(5) was an important Shaoxing, Shanyin lineage. Gang's brother-in-law, Zhang(1) Duanli [3168], was from a prominent Chuzhou, Longquan xian lineage (zhuxing). One of Duanli's two sons-in-law was Gang's son, Zongzhi [3538], and the second was Gang's nephew, Linzhi [3516]. Gang's and Shen's [1073] (qv) lineages were probably related. Gang's grandson, Dayou [3535], was Tiju Fujian shibo in 1208. Fujian TZ, 32.17b; Li Gang, WJ, 169.2a, 'xingzhuang, shang, zhong, xia;' Li Gang nianpu [pages refer to nianpu]; Yang Shi, WJ, 32.1a, 10b. See also 'fulu' for authors of sacrificial prayers, posthumous name essay, etc. CBD, 2, 901-3.

desc.desc: Patron was (= Client of)Supportive political association
Patron was (= Client of)Supportive political association

desc.label: 主管江州太平觀 紹興初 以李綱等薦擢知海州 改連州 民上供銀免蠲其半
元豐中嘗為晉陵簿 尋以薦改承事郎 靖康中宰相李綱為御營司幹辦公事 建炎中薦詔辭不就 以壽終
高宗時上言黃潛善、汪伯彥奸邪 謫江州 李綱薦為河北招撫使 所方招徠豪傑 為恢復計
調瑞安、登封兩縣丞 靖康初元 以李綱薦 召對除都官員外郎 拜徽猷閣待制
金人破荊湖 獨能保境土 李綱上言於朝 遷寶文閣

desc.label: 臺檄昭武考試，讀李綱文卷，批云：此子必能為國了事。擢為解首。
desc.desc: Praised or admired bySupportive political association

desc.label: 宣和三年登第 臺檄昭武考試 讀李綱文卷 批云：此子必能為國了事 擢為解首
遇事奮然不顧 敢誅殺 李綱之罷 太學生陳東等撾鼓伏闕 王時雍欲寘東等於獄
乃密與兄攸議 稍持正論 遂引吳敏、李綱、李光、楊時等用之 以挽物情 欽宗立
上書論蔡京、童貫、王黼、李彥、梁師成、朱勔六人為六賊 請誅之以謝天下 李綱罷 復率諸生伏宣德門上書 從者數萬
言皆切當 多見採納 會李綱罷相 上疏爭之 干執政怒
登與陳東上書乞斬六賊 廷臣復建和議 奪种師道、李綱兵柄 登與東再抱書詣闕請留綱 中紹興三年進士
靖康元年伏闕上書 乞斬蔡京、童貫等六奸臣 復李綱相 聲震中外 尋授承信郎
靖康初，嘗率同舍生陳東、劉銓等六十餘人伏闕上書，請復用李網。
晉江人 受學於楊時 在太學與陳東共上書留李綱 東被誅 遂變名遊瓊州
